Find out if your room requests have been: Find out if your room requests have been confirmed or declined, if there are changes to your appointments, and more.
Learn the status of your budget calculat: Learn the status of your budget calculations, which documents have been released for you, if your funding source has gone into deficit, and more.
Find out if there are new booking reques: Find out if there are new booking requests for the rooms you manage. Also, get reminders to process urgent requests, and more.
Find out if there are new tasks for you: Find out if there are new tasks for you and your team. Also, receive reminders to complete urgent tasks, and more.
Find out if there are changes to your pr: Find out if there are changes to your projects, if you have been added to a new project or team, and more.
Find out if shifts have been changed, if: Find out if shifts have been changed, if there were conflicts in shift scheduling, if employees need to be replaced, and more.
Changes to budget and funding sources: Changes to budget and funding sources
Funding source has reached the set thres: Funding source has reached the set threshold
Find out if your room requests have been: Find out if your room requests have been confirmed or declined.
Be notified as soon as someone schedules: Be notified as soon as someone schedules an appointment that conflicts with one of your appointments.
Find out if there have been any changes: Find out if there have been any changes to your appointments or if an appointment has been cancelled.
Find out whether loud events or events w: Find out whether loud events or events with an audience have been set in an adjacent room at the same time as one of your events.
Get notified when your access to project: Get notified when your access to project budgets or funding sources has changed.
Get notified when parts of your calculat: Get notified when parts of your calculation have been committed, requested for verification or verified.
Get notified when there are changes to y: Get notified when there are changes to your project's budget, funding source or copyrights. You will also receive a warning as soon as your funding source has slipped into the red.
You will be notified as soon as the fund: You will be notified as soon as the funding source expires.
You will be notified as soon as the funding source reaches the defined threshold.
Find out whether you have received appro: Find out whether you have received approval for documents or contracts and whether there have been any changes to these documents.
Find out if there are new or changed roo: Find out if there are new or changed room requests.
Be reminded when room requests become ur: Be reminded when room requests become urgent.
You will be notified as soon as there ar: You will be notified as soon as there are changes to your rooms or your room responsibilities.
Find out if there are new tasks for you: Find out if there are new tasks for you or your team.
Be reminded when tasks become urgent or: Be reminded when tasks become urgent or have already have already exceeded their deadline.
Find out if there are any changes to you: Find out if there are any changes to your tasks
Find out if there are any changes in you: Find out if there are any changes in your projects or groups and what role you have in the project team.
Be notified as soon as there are changes: Be notified as soon as there are changes to your projects that may affect public relations.
You will be notified as soon as your tea: You will be notified as soon as your team membership changes.
Find out whether your shifts have been c: Find out whether your shifts have been changed, you have been reassigned or deleted from a shift.
Find out whether your shift planning col: Find out whether your shift planning collides with legal regulations, e.g. if you have been scheduled for too long at a time or too few breaks.
Find out whether your shift planning for: Find out whether your shift planning for others collides with legal regulations, e.g. if you have scheduled one user for too long at a time or with too few breaks.
Find out whether shift schedules conflic: Find out whether shift schedules conflict with legal regulations, e.g. employees have been scheduled with too few breaks.
Find out if someone has made changes to: Find out if someone has made changes to your availability.
Find out if an employee has a new availa: Find out if an employee has a new availability or you need to fill someone new.
User can view all projects including pro: User can view all projects including project details and calendar bookings.
User can create, edit, and delete projec: User can create, edit, and delete projects, automatically becoming project admin of the created project.
User has project admin rights on all pro: User has project admin rights on all projects, even if not part of the project team.
User can delete all projects, even if no: User can delete all projects, even if not part of the project team.
User can act as project manager within p: User can act as project manager within projects.
User can request room bookings for their: User can request room bookings for their own projects and edit or delete their own requests.
Allowed to view & download contract comp: Allowed to view & download contract components
User is allowed to view and download con: User is allowed to view and download contract components.
User is allowed to upload and delete con: User is allowed to upload and delete contract components.
User is allowed to create their own fund: User is allowed to create their own funding sources and be invited for viewing & managing funding sources.
Has write and delete rights on all fundi: Has write and delete rights on all funding sources
User has write and delete rights on all: User has write and delete rights on all funding sources.
Allowed to view, edit, and delete all bu: Allowed to view, edit, and delete all budget documents & contracts from all projects
User is allowed to view, edit, and delet: User is allowed to view, edit, and delete all budget documents & contracts from all projects.
Allowed to remove any verification or fi: Allowed to remove any verification or fixed statuses and unlock locked columns
User is allowed to remove any verificati: User is allowed to remove any verification or fixed statuses and unlock locked columns.
User is allowed to edit the basic settin: User is allowed to edit the basic settings of the tool, such as replacing logos, defining legal notice, etc.
User can create, edit, and delete teams: User can create, edit, and delete teams (departments) in the system. These teams can then be assigned to projects, for example.
User can create, delete, and edit rooms.
User can define, edit, and delete projec: User can define, edit, and delete project categories, genres, and areas in the system settings.
User can define, edit, and delete types: User can define, edit, and delete types of appointments in the system settings.
User can create, edit, and delete checkl: User can create, edit, and delete checklist templates. All templates can then be used by all other users.
User can create, edit, and delete system: User can create, edit, and delete system notifications. These notifications are displayed to all users.
User can create and edit employee pages: User can create and edit employee pages but cannot invite users.
User cannot create employee pages but ca: User cannot create employee pages but can schedule users.
Global budget access without document vi: Global budget access without document viewing
User has budget access to all projects,: User has budget access to all projects, meaning they can view budget planning of all projects without accessing the documents.
Global budget access with document viewi: Global budget access with document viewing
User has budget access to all projects,: User has budget access to all projects, meaning they can view both budget planning and documents of all projects.
User can view the global shift plan.
User can view and edit the conditions of: User can view and edit the conditions of external employees.
View and delete Sage data records: View and delete Sage data records
Users with this permission can view unas: Users with this permission can view unassigned Sage data records.
The admin has all permissions in the sys: The admin has all permissions in the system and can therefore see and edit everything.

Customize your calendar subscription to: Customize your calendar subscription to suit your individual needs. Select a specific time period, certain appointment types and activate notifications to stay optimally informed and make your planning easier. Use these settings to configure your calendar according to your preferences and stay organized.
Select a specific period for your calend: Select a specific period for your calendar subscription. If you do not select a period, the subscription will continue indefinitely. This allows you to subscribe to the calendar for a set period of time only.
Select event types for calendar subscrip: Select event types for calendar subscription
Select specific types of events for your: Select specific types of events for your calendar subscription. This allows you to specify which event types should be displayed in your subscribed calendar to optimize your planning.
Receive timely notifications about upcom: Receive timely notifications about upcoming events. Activate this option to receive reminders and alerts for your scheduled events and make sure you don't miss any important events.
Instructions for subscribing to the cale: Instructions for subscribing to the calendar
Here you will find detailed instructions: Here you will find detailed instructions on how to subscribe to the calendar in various applications. Follow the appropriate links for your favorite calendar application to complete the subscription process and stay up to date with your appointments. You can also manually import the calendar into your calendar application by downloading the ICS file.
Use the following URL to import the cale: Use the following URL to import the calendar into your calendar application and stay up to date:
Click on “Copy” to copy the URL to your: Click on “Copy” to copy the URL to your clipboard and paste it into the desired calendar application.
Download the ICS file to manually import: Download the ICS file to manually import the calendar directly into your application:
Attention - The ICS file is not updated: Attention - The ICS file is not updated automatically. You must re-import the file regularly to keep it up to date.
Select specific areas for your calendar: Select specific areas for your calendar subscription. This allows you to define which areas should be displayed in your subscribed calendar to optimize your planning.
Select specific rooms for your calendar: Select specific rooms for your calendar subscription. This allows you to define which rooms should be displayed in your subscribed calendar to optimize your planning.
As soon as you click on “Save”, your sub: As soon as you click on “Save”, your subscription will be updated and the settings will be saved. If you have subscribed to the calendar via the link, your entries in the calendar program will be updated automatically. Alternatively, you can also download the ICS file and then insert it into your calendar program.
How to subscribe to a calendar in Google: How to subscribe to a calendar in Google Calendar:
Click on the plus sign next to “More cal: Click on the plus sign next to “More calendars” and select “By URL”.
Enter the URL (see text box) and click o: Enter the URL (see text box) and click on “Add calendar”.
How to subscribe to a calendar in Apple: How to subscribe to a calendar in Apple Calendar:
Enter the URL (see text box) and click o: Enter the URL (see text box) and click on "Subscribe".
How to subscribe to a calendar in Thunde: How to subscribe to a calendar in Thunderbird Lightning:
Right-click on the calendar panel and se: Right-click on the calendar panel and select "New Calendar".
Select \"iCalendar (ICS)\" and enter the: Select "iCalendar (ICS)" and enter the URL (see text box). Click "Next".
Give the calendar a name and choose a co: Give the calendar a name and choose a color. Click "Next" and then "Finish".
How to subscribe to a calendar in Yahoo: How to subscribe to a calendar in Yahoo Calendar:
Click on the gear icon and select \"Subs: Click on the gear icon and select "Subscribe to Calendar".
Enter the URL (see text box) in the \"iC: Enter the URL (see text box) in the "iCal Address" field and click "Subscribe to Calendar".
How to subscribe to a calendar in Zoho C: How to subscribe to a calendar in Zoho Calendar:
Click on the plus sign next to \"My Cale: Click on the plus sign next to "My Calendars" and select "Subscribe to Calendar".
Select \"By URL\" and enter the URL (see: Select "By URL" and enter the URL (see text box). Click "Subscribe".
How to subscribe to a calendar in the An: How to subscribe to a calendar in the Android Calendar app:
Open the calendar app on your Android de: Open the calendar app on your Android device.
Select \"Add by URL\" and enter the URL: Select "Add by URL" and enter the URL (see text box). Click "Subscribe".
How to subscribe to a calendar in Outloo: How to subscribe to a calendar in Outlook.com:
Click on \"Add calendar\" and select \"F: Click on "Add calendar" and select "From internet".
Enter the URL (see text box) and click o: Enter the URL (see text box) and click on "Import calendar".

Public holidays & school vacations via i: Public holidays & school vacations via interface
With this interface, you can select the: With this interface, you can select the public holidays and school vacations for the federal states that are relevant to you. This means you only receive the data you really need and it is automatically entered into your calendar. You can update your calendar at any time to ensure that it always contains the latest public holidays and school vacations for your selected federal states. This keeps you informed at all times and allows you to plan with ease and precision.
Select the federal states for which you: Select the federal states for which you want to import the public holidays and school vacations into your calendar. You can select as many federal states as you like. You can then specify a color in which the public holidays and school vacations should be displayed in your calendar.
What data would you like to import?: What data would you like to import?
Select whether you only want to import t: Select whether you only want to import the public holidays or also the school vacations into your calendar.
Import the public holidays for the feder: Import the public holidays for the federal states you have selected into your calendar.
Import the school vacations for the fede: Import the school vacations for the federal states you have selected into your calendar.
Changes have been made. Please save!: Changes have been made. Please save!
Here you have the option of creating pub: Here you have the option of creating public holidays and school vacations yourself. These are then displayed in your calendar and you can edit them individually. For example, you can also create your own public holidays or school vacations that are not included in the official calendars.
Select the federal states that should ap: Select the federal states that should apply to this public holiday. You can select as many federal states as you like. You can then specify a color in which the public holiday should be displayed in your calendar. You do not have to select a federal state if the public holiday applies throughout Germany.
Each time you run the interface again, a: Each time you run the interface again, all previously imported public holidays and school vacations are removed from your calendar and replaced with the latest data. This ensures that only the latest information from your selected federal states is in your calendar, without old entries.

Edit the holiday by filling in the field: Edit the holiday by filling in the fields. You can rename the holiday, change the date and adjust the federal states and color.
